name: Wikipedia - WikiClean: Minimal + Readable (mod)
description:
This is "Wikipedia - WikiClean: Minimal + Readable" with few small changes to make it even more readable. A whiter background for easier readability.

Original Wikipedia: http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/5448/wikioriginal.jpg
Wiki-Clean (mod): http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/3755/wikiclean.jpg
